aboutMe.part2: I am from Barcelona, and I have {experienceYears} years of experience as a software engineer.

andy.description: Andy is a B2B SaaS, specialising in the digitisation of restaurant operations.

responsibilities.part1: Developing the frontend and backend of Andy.

objectivesAchieved.part2: Successfully develop two McDonald's projects (example: https://pidetufactura.mcdonalds.es)
objectivesAchieved.part3: Improve performance of Andy (examples: adding api cache, db pagination, app memory usage)
